trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint that is used by services to send announcement messages over a UDP binding.
This endpoint inherits from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> and similarly has a fixed contract and supports two discovery versions.
In addition it has a fixed UDP binding and a default address value as specified in the WS-Discovery specifications (WS-Discovery April 2005 or WS-Discovery version 1.1).
Therefore, in the simplest case you do not have to specify any of these values when you create an <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> and add it to a service.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> class.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> class that is configured to use the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref>.
The version of the WS-Discovery protocol to use.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified multicast address.
The multicast address.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified multicast address.
The multicast address.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> that is configured to use the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> and multicast address.
The version of the WS-Discovery protocol to use.
The multicast address to use.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> that is configured to use the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> and multicast address.
The version of the WS-Discovery protocol to use.
The multicast address to use.
The default UDP multicast address for IPv4.
The default UDP multicast address for IPv6.
Gets or sets the endpointâ€™s multicast address.
The default value is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint.DefaultIPv4MulticastAddress>.
A <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> instance.
Gets the UDP transport settings associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpAnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> instance.
The UDP transport settings.
